6.80: Moment of Courage Now only procs one extra lifesteal attack. Increased buff grace period from 0.5 to 1. Reduced cooldown reduced from 1.2 to 0.9.
6.81: Overwhelming Odds Increased bonus damage per hero is from 14/16/18/20 to 20/35/50/65. Rescaled base damage from 50/100/150/200 to 60/100/140/180. Increased radius increased from 315 to 330.  Moment of Courage now uses Pseudo Random chance.
6.82: Enabled in Captain's Mode  Duel no longer disables passive abilities. Reduced  Overwhelming Odds base damage from 60/100/140/180 to 40/80/120/160. Increased  Press the Attack manacost from 80/90/100/110 to 110.
6.84: Overwhelming Odds no longer ignores ancient creeps, Roshan and creep-heroes.  Moment of Courage Increased proc chance from 16%/18%/20%/22% to 25% on each level. Increased lifesteal from 20%/40%/60%/80% to 55%/65%/75%/85%. Increased cooldown from 0.9 on each level to 2.7/2.1/1.5/0.9. Added  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade for Legion Commander: Causes  Duel to last until either Legion Commander or her target dies. Ends if duelists are ever more than 2000 range apart.
6.78: Increased  Duel attack damage bonus per victory from 10 to 10/14/18.
6.79c: Dueling units now fully ignore disarms and can no longer be pushed by  Force Staff away.
6.75: Reduced  Overwhelming Odds bonus summoned unit/illusion damage from 50% to 25%. Rescaled  Press the Attack cooldown from 15 to 16/15/14/13.
6.74: Increased  Moment of Courage cooldown from 0.9 to 1.2.
6.73b: Duel can now only target heroes (it didn't do anything on non-heroes already).
6.73c: Increased  Moment of Courage cooldown from 0.75 to 0.9.
6.79: Increased base movement speed from 310 to 320.  Overwhelming Odds Reduced base damage from 60/120/180/240 to 50/100/150/200. Increased bonus damage per unit from 10 to 14/16/18/20. Increased  Duel cast range from 100 to 150. Increased  Press the Attack duration from 4 to 5.
